item.title: Members of our lab
item.description: Dr.Xin Wang Associate Professor, Biomedical Sciences, City University HK Postdoctoral Fellow, Harvard Medical School, Supervisor: Dr. Peter Kharchenko PhD, Department of Oncology and Cancer Research UK Cambridge Institute, University of Cambridge, Supervisor: Dr. Florian Markowetz. Office: 1B-102, 1/F, Block 1, To Yuen Building Phone: +852 3442-2367 Fax: +852 3442-0549 Email: xin.wang@cityu.edu.hk Department webpage ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— PhD Students Feng Gao Feng is mainly focusing on applying artificial intelligence techniques such as deep learning to cancer research,
